amendment.description: To strike the sunset of the repeal of the tax on employee health insurance premiums and health plan benefits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 502 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 48. Record Vote Number: 177.

action.text: Amendment SA 502 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 267.
